alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 01 at 7:30PM CST until March 05 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...From late Friday night to late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, minor agricultural flooding occurs. Williams Road east of Panama is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 22.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 31.3 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
